Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to qualifications for holding the office of deputy sheriff in the county of Montgomery
Summary: Expands the area outside Montgomery county in which a deputy sheriff in Montgomery county may reside.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to qualifications for holding the office of deputy sheriff in the county of Montgomery
